forum.name: artboard
forum.latestCommentText: a new quik card with a style akin to the original.

thread.title: via ideas

comments.text: i've got a few areas in mind. train, boat, bus, plane, rv, and portals! what else could be done?
had this thought, what if we had a luxury cruise ship? it could have an on-deck and a separate inside ballroom kind of setup (and the deck could double as transit).
great ideas! the skydiving gives me ideas for "escape pods" or even some sort of submarine bell- like the intro to bioshock... cruise ship would be awesome too, multi deck
heres a few ideas . hotairbaloon, car, mono rail, elevator, and horse drawn cerrage.
i'd like to have a blimp/airship transit mode to connect floating or distant places. should be small enough so that you can copy the airship and place it in your own world for lulz
